DOC.brief_summary: Toward personalised treatment in early metastatic prostate cancer based on the assessment of biomarkers in cancer tissue samples and circulating tumour cells.
DOC.brief_title: Prostate Cancer Evaluation of TaRgets in Genito Urinary Screening Program
DOC.criteria: Prostate Cancer patients Castration Resistant Prostatic tissue available Metastasis which may be biopsied
